item.description:
Adult indoor Roller Skate / Roller Blading

Sunday Oct. 14th. 8 pm.
Chez-Vous
11 Rhoades st.
Dorchester Ma. 02124

Cost: $10.
Skate rental are available.
Carpooling from AND along the way.  Starting in Nashua NH., at 7 pm. through Chelmsford, Burlington and down rt. 93.
Host: Steve Ob1 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is a great place to learn, or to improve your skating skills. If you make an attempt to find him and let know you are there? Steve Ob1 (wearing a yellow shirt that reads: "The Big Apple Roll") He will do his best to introduce you some of the other skater. Otherwise he is there mainly for his work out. But, he is an instructor, and if asked, he will be happy to offer you some free help to get you started. So, come and see skating in an new way. The skaters at this rink, are some of the best free dancer skaters in N.E..There are also roller derby skaters and those who are into speed.

Steve Ob1. carpools from Nashua at 7 pm. on down. The doors of the rink open at 8 to midnight. Because this is Steve Ob1.'s work out. He will not make it much past 10:30. That  usually puts us back in Nashua, NH around 11:30 pm

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading Boston
